data.name: AV.Runner
data.detailed_description:
Run free in a tranquil world. Enjoy the movement. Discover. Relax.


Freedom: Explore and clean up the world; race against time; or simply run

Movement: Learn how to wall-run; combine slides and jumps to go fast; use abilities: swinging, dashing, flying, ...

Discover: Find secrets and unlock new ways to play

Anti-frustration: Rewinding, slow motion and other systems that allow you to keep up the flow

Customization: From visual to gameplay: create your own atmosphere, your own movement rules

Level editor: build and share your own worlds

Accessibility: Simplified controls, input help, color customization, options to disable all visual effects, low-end performance settings

data.short_description: AV.Runner is a relaxing yet speedy first-person platformer experience, with a focus on player freedom and customization.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD A6 @ 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
